C3: Finds all Singer cycles whose matrix is a companion matrix.
Computes the normalizer of a cyclic group, see Section~\ref{sec:group:magma}.
Computes the conjugacy classes of elements, see Section~\ref{sec:group:magma}.
Computes the lattice of subgroups by means of conjugacy classes of subgroups, see Section~\ref{sec:group:magma}.
Produces a printout of all group elements.
Produces a latex report of all group elements.
Writes the elements of the group to the given csv file.
Exports the inversion graphs associated to the group elements to the given file.
Expresses a word in terms of the given set of generators.
Multiplies all group elements together. The output depends on the chosen stabilizer chain.
Determine a group element mapping a to b. Computes the stabilizer of b in the given group $G$ (the group for which the activity is applied).
Computes the rational normal form of the given group element (must be a matrix group).
Computes an element $g$ which conjugates $a$ to $b$ or states that the given elements $a$ and $b$ are not conjugate.

Creates a group of automorphisms by assigning image values to certain generators. The vector v is a vector of group elements. The image values are numerical values representing indices in the vector v.
